short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Say NO to digital slavery, say NO to the big advertising and marketing evil business. It's time to break some cookies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say no to obtrusive pop-ups, tracking cookies, and invasions of privacy. It's time to smash cookies.

AdiosCookies disables all tracking plugins, tracking cookies, and annoying popups that make using the internet a misery.

AdiosCookies makes your browser quicker and keeps your privacy private by eliminating all of this.

An example of what AdiosCookies removes:
- tracking systems (matomo, etc)
- ads systems (taboola, etc)
- Cookies pop-ups (onetrust, etc)
- Newsletter pop-ups (mailchimp, shopify etc)

And much more!

AdiosCookies is really fast, by using low level web browsers mechanisms. Don't hesitate to try it !
